/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by tall buildings and construction cranes, indicating a city in the throes of growth and development. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly green, blue, and gray, reflecting both the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
